thread.section_title: Tony Kealys Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Tony Kealys | tonykealys.com
thread.title: Stewart Lawrence
thread.title_full: Tony Kealys reviewed by Stewart Lawrence

author: Stewart Lawrence
title: Stewart Lawrence
text:
The buggy we ordered online went out of stock quickly. I guess that's bound to happen for sale items like this one. We were contacted quickly alerting us to the stock outage and given options. We elected to wait for the item to come back in stock. While we were told a notification would arrive after two weeks, that must have been overlooked. But after contacting them we found it was ready for collection.
In store staff were nice and very helpful.
